i.name: Living Forge
i.description:
Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13, he will upgrade any eligible items into masterwork items for himself, up to 2 max. For each level after 13, Ornn can upgrade an item for an ally by going near them and clicking on them, max 1 per ally.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

q.name: Volcanic Rupture
q.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

w.name: Bellows Breath
w.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

e.name: Searing Charge
e.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

r.name: Call of the Forge God
r.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

riot.name: Living Forge
riot.description:
Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13, he will upgrade any eligible items into masterwork items for himself, up to 2 max. For each level after 13, Ornn can upgrade an item for an ally by going near them and clicking on them, max 1 per ally.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

i1.name: Living Forge
i1.blurb: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase. Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ornn''' gains an additional {{sti|armor|{{as|10% '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|10% '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} from all sources.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Living Forge:}} '''Ornn''' can purchase non-[[Consumable item|consumable]] [[items]] from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a ''Forge Menu'' with his recommended items to select to be ''forged''. [[Channel|Forging]] takes 4 seconds and the process is interrupted if '''Ornn''' enters combat, disabling ''Living Forge''. On {{tip|Howling Abyss}}, '''Ornn''' can forge an item once every 120 seconds.
i1.description3:
{{sbc|Master Craftman:}} When '''Ornn''' reaches level 13, any upgradable ({{sbc|Masterwork}}) item '''Ornn''' owns or purchases for the rest of the game is upgraded for free, up to a maximum of 2. Additionally, for each level after 13 (level 14, 15, 16 and 17), '''Ornn''' can upgrade one of his ally's upgradable items ({{sbc|Masterwork}}) by getting within 600 range of them and clicking on them, up to a maximum of 1 per ally.
* {{sbc|Masterwork}} items:
** {{sbc|Attack Damage Items:}} {{ii|Might of the Ruined King}}, {{ii|Molten Edge}}, {{ii|The Obsidian Cleaver}}, {{ii|Trinity Fusion}}, {{ii|Youmuu's Wraithblade}}.
** {{sbc|Ability Power Items:}} {{ii|Luden's Pulse}}, {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcrown}}, {{ii|Wooglet's Witchcrown}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Paradox}}.
** {{sbc|Tank Items:}} {{ii|Forgefire Cape}}, {{ii|Frozen Fist}}, {{ii|Infernal Mask}}.
** {{sbc|Support Items:}} {{ii|Circlet of the Iron Solari}}, {{ii|Salvation}}.
i1.description4: {{sbc|Temper:}} '''Ornn's''' basic attacks against {{tip|Brittle}} enemies briefly {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}}.
i1.description5: Enemies made {{tip|Brittle}} by '''Ornn''' take {{as|{{pp|key=%|type=Ornn's level|12 to 20.5}} of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} the next time they are [[basic attack]]ed by '''Ornn''' or {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by '''Ornn''' or his allies, consuming ''Brittle''.
i1.customlabel: {{tt|Disable Time|Cannot be reduced by cooldown reduction}}
notes: * {{g|Gold}} is only deducted upon completing the channel.
* The reduction in Tenacity will benefit all applicable types of crowd control, not just immobilizes. Effects such as slows, blinds and silences will be empowered without consuming the debuff.
* Despite the in-game tooltip attribute ''Brittle'' to {{ai|Bellows Breath|Ornn}}, it is not required to rank Bellows Breath in order to benefit from the effect.
* {{pending for test}} The bonus magic damage inflicted by ''Brittle'' is credited to '''Ornn'''.

* Mastercraft items and their components are not the same item and so in theory any unnamed passives would stack. This is true for the {{sti|Heal and Shield Power}} from {{ii|Redemption}} and {{ii|Salvation}} stack, which grants 20% when used together, and {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} and {{ii|The Obsidian Cleaver}}, which each apply 1 stack (for a total of 2) per instance of physical damage. However:
** The passive of {{ii|Infinity Edge}} and {{ii|Molten Edge}} do not stack.
** The passive of {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} and {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcrown}} do not stack, and ''Deathcap's'' passive will state that it grants 0 AP while using the item.

riot.description:
Ornn gains an additional 10% bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13, he will upgrade any eligible items into masterwork items for himself, up to 2 max. For each level after 13, Ornn can upgrade an item for an ally by going near them and clicking on them, max 1 per ally.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

i2.customlabel: {{tt|Disable Time|Cannot be reduced by cooldown reduction}}
notes: * {{g|Gold}} is only deducted upon completing the channel.
* The reduction in Tenacity will benefit all applicable types of crowd control, not just immobilizes. Effects such as slows, blinds and silences will be empowered without consuming the debuff.
* Despite the in-game tooltip attribute ''Brittle'' to {{ai|Bellows Breath|Ornn}}, it is not required to rank Bellows Breath in order to benefit from the effect.

* Mastercraft items and their components are not the same item and so in theory any unnamed passives would stack. This is true for the {{sti|Heal and Shield Power}} from {{ii|Redemption}} and {{ii|Salvation}} stack, which grants 20% when used together, and {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} and {{ii|The Obsidian Cleaver}}, which each apply 1 stack (for a total of 2) per instance of physical damage. However:
** The passive of {{ii|Infinity Edge}} and {{ii|Molten Edge}} do not stack.
** The passive of {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} and {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcrown}} do not stack, and ''Deathcap's'' passive will state that it grants 0 AP while using the item.

riot.name: Volcanic Rupture
riot.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
riot.tooltip:
Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and slows by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The fissure stops shortly after hitting an enemy champion.

q1.name: Volcanic Rupture
q1.blurb: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' slams his hammer into the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.
q1.description2: After a {{fd|1.125}}-second delay, a '''{{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn|magma pillar}}''' erupts at maximum range, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} enemies hit and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
q1.description3: ''The '''pillar''' will not expire while '''Ornn''' is {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn|charging}}.''
notes: * The fissure will move an 200 units beyond the first champion it hits, not exceeding the maximum range of the ability. ''It can still damage additional targets.''
* The '''pillar''''s formation applies brief displacement. Doing so consumes all stacks of brittle on the displaced targets.
* The eruption will occur in front of {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
* If launched in a wall, pillar will try to appear on the other side of the wall, if it cannot the pillar will be destroyed.

riot.name: Bellows Breath
riot.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
riot.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards, breathing fire and becoming unstoppable for {{ e1 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ passivedamagecalc }} of their max health as magic damage.

Ornn's basic attacks knock back Brittle targets.

w1.name: Bellows Breath
w1.blurb: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' marches {{tip|Unstoppable|unstoppably}} in the target direction with 35% reduced movement speed for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
w1.description2: Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.15}} seconds to enemies hit. The final bout of flame will apply {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds.
w1.description3: ''Bellows Breath'' has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage, as well.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|12 to 16}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Damage Per Instance|{{as|{{ap|12/5 to 16/5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
w1.leveling3:
{{st|Total Minimum/Minion Damage|{{ap|80 to 280}}|Minimum/Minion Damage Per Instance|{{ap|80/5 to 280/5}}}}
{{st|Total Monster Damage|{{ap|155 to 255}}|Monster Damage Per Instance|{{ap|155/5 to 255/5}}}}
notes: * The belch deals 5 instances of damage.
* The final instance of damage will be blocked by spell shields and won't apply ''Brittle''.

riot.name: Searing Charge
riot.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that knocks up enemies for {{ e6 }} second and applies Searing Charge's damage to those not hit by the charge.

The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

e1.name: Searing Charge
e1.blurb: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|charges}} forward, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.
e1.description2: If '''Ornn''' collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave that deals the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} enemies within for 1 second. Enemies can only be damaged once by ''Searing Charge''.
e1.description3: The shockwave destroys '''{{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn|Magma pillars}}''' and terrain created by enemy champions.
notes: * Spell shields will block one instance of damage.

riot.name: Call of the Forge God
riot.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
riot.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage, are slowed by up to {{ e5 }}% based on distance traveled by the elemental for {{ e6 }} seconds and become Brittle for {{ f10 }} seconds.

Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks the first enemy champion hit up for 1.5 seconds (50% duration for subsequent champion hits), deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and applies Brittle.

r1.name: Call of the Forge God
r1.blurb: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
r1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Ornn''' summons an elemental at maximum range in the target direction that stampedes toward him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds, as well as applying {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds. The {{tip|slow}} scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, with a minimum of 10%.
r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125|175|225}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|250|350|450}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}{{st|Maximum Slow|{{ap|40|60|80}}%}}
r1.description2: While stampeding, '''Ornn''' can re-activate ''Call of the Forge God''.
r1.description3: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward in the target direction. If '''Ornn''' collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction and empowering it to {{tip|airborne|knock up}} enemies hit for 1 second, reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first enemy champion hit. ''Call of the Forge God'' can affect enemies twice and applies {{tip|Brittle}} on each hit.
notes: * The second cast cannot be activated while grounded and will be interrupted by knockdown.
* The dash on the second cast cannot be used to pass through persistent terrain.
* If '''Ornn''' does not use or misses the elemental on the second cast, the elemental will continue ~500 units behind the cast location.
* Spell shields will block one instance of damage.

<!--* The elemental is classified as a [[Champion summoned units|champion summoned unit]] and not a projectile. The elemental is immune to crowd control effects, meaning it will not be affected by {{ai|Steadfast Presence|Poppy}} or {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}.-->
